name: 2am
description:
ah, what a bummer! this pesky brain of yours just doesn't want you to fall asleep, does it:?

\(˃ʍ˂)/

CW: suicidal thoughts are described in detail

hey pumpkins, hope you're doing well! 

this is the first game i ever actually finished. it's veeeery smol and came about very spontaneously (and also arguably qualifies as a game only by a long stretch), but i'm kind of proud (*•̀ᴗ•́*)و ̑̑

take care <3
